sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content:
Sets the "default status" of a button specified by widgetID. If a button is the default button, then it is drawn with a heavy outline and it is activated when the user presses ENTER.

Only one button can be the default button per window. If a button is set to be the default button, then the previous default button has its "default status" removed.
sections.mdown_content:
Sets the "default status" of a button specified by *widgetID*. 
If a button is the default button, then it is drawn with a heavy 
outline and it is activated when the user presses ENTER.
Only one button can be the default button per window. If a button 
is set to be the default button, then the previous default button 
has its "default status" removed.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the procedures by calling GUI.SetDefault, not by calling SetDefault.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the procedures by calling 
**GUI.SetDefault**, not by calling **SetDefault**.
